mapper.insert: INSERT INTO medicine (med_num, mem_num, med_title, med_name, med_sdate, med_edate, med_time, med_dosage, med_note) VALUES (drug_seq.nextval, #{mem_num}, #{med_title}, #{med_name}, #{med_sdate}, #{med_edate}, #{med_time}, #{med_dosage}, #{med_note})
mapper.update: UPDATE medicine SET med_title = #{med_title}, med_name = #{med_name}, med_sdate = #{med_sdate}, med_edate = #{med_edate}, med_time = #{med_time}, med_dosage = #{med_dosage}, med_note = #{med_note} WHERE med_num = #{med_num}
